channel.title: Comments on: Welcome Chris Anderson as our Keynote Speaker!

item.title: By: Alain
item.dc:creator: Alain
item.description: Any idea if there will be some replays of this keynote? I saw some live tweets from OHS and it sounds very interesting...
item.content:encoded: Any idea if there will be some replays of this keynote? I saw some live tweets from OHS and it sounds very interesting…

item.title: By: Appolinaire ZAGABE

item.description: Great job Chris, I wish I could participate.
item.content:encoded: Great job Chris, I wish I could participate.

item.title: By: Open Hardware Summit – Chris Anderson Keynote « adafruit industries blog
item.dc:creator: Open Hardware Summit – Chris Anderson Keynote « adafruit industries blog
item.description: [...] Open Hardware Summit – Chris Anderson Keynote. Dustyn writes - We’re thrilled to announce that Chris Anderson will give the keynote address at the 2012 Open Hardware Summit! Chris is the editor-in-chief of Wired Magazine, author of The Long Tail and Free, chairman of 3D Robotics/DIY Drones, founder of GeekDad, and father of 5 kids. On top of that, his latest book – Makers: The New Industrial Revolution – is set to be released shortly after the Summit. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Open Hardware Summit – Chris Anderson Keynote. Dustyn writes – We’re thrilled to announce that Chris Anderson will give the keynote address at the 2012 Open Hardware Summit! Chris is the editor-in-chief of Wired Magazine, author of The Long Tail and Free, chairman of 3D Robotics/DIY Drones, founder of GeekDad, and father of 5 kids. On top of that, his latest book – Makers: The New Industrial Revolution – is set to be released shortly after the Summit. […]
